original_text: ‘Teacher,’ they said to him, ‘Moses said in the Bible: A man may die and leave behind a wife but no children. Then that man's brother must marry the woman. Then their children will be called the children of the brother who died.
korean_text: 선생님이여 모세가 일렀으되 사람이 만일 자식이 없이 죽으면 그 동생이 그 아내에게 장가 들어 형을 위하여 상속자를 세울지니라 하였나이다

sentences.original_text: and leave behind a wife but no children
sentences.korean_translation: 아내는 남기고 아이는 남기지 않고 죽을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Then that man's brother must marry the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 남자의 형제가 그 여자와 결혼해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Then their children will be called
the children of the brother who died
